description.value: The Ork is proficient in the use of Shootas, Sluggas, Big Choppas, Choppas, and All Primitive Melee Weapons, and so can use them without -20 Penalty.

system.benefit: The Ork is proficient in the use of Shootas, Sluggas, Big Choppas, Choppas, and All Primitive Melee Weapons, and so can use them without -20 Penalty.
